meanings.sent1: The stenches from the garbage cans made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The stenches coming from the sewer were unbearable.
meanings.sent3: The stenches in the old haunted house added to its spooky atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The stenches of failure lingered in the air after the exam.
meanings.sent5: The stenches of rotten eggs filled the room, making everyone gag.

meanings.sent1: We wrinkled our noses at the stenches wafting from the dumpster.
meanings.sent2: The stenches of decay permeated the abandoned building.
meanings.sent3: The stenches of burnt popcorn in the office microwave were a daily occurrence.
meanings.sent4: The stenches of betrayal hung heavy in the air between them.
meanings.sent5: The stenches of the swamp invaded our nostrils as we ventured deeper into the forest.
